frontmatter.title: Extended Kalman Filtering: Dead Reckoning and Bearing Measurements for an yacht

node.html:
• Estimation of states of the yacht using system model of the yacht and measurement model of the sensors

  • Sensors

    • a beacon
    • a log which measures the speed of the ship
    • compass that measures the heading direction (direction of movement) of the ship
  • Evaluation of the consistensy of the filter using NIS and chi square test

Vehicle trajectory estimation using static landmarks in an unexplored area. Three types of methadologies are investigated, viz.,

  • Prediction Only
  • Bearing and Distance Measurements
  • Bearing Only

  • Bearing and Distance Measurements
